bundle.shortDescription: A cross-platform desktop application for stream controller devices
bundle.longDescription: OpenDeck is a desktop application for using stream controller devices like the Elgato Stream Deck. OpenDeck conforms to the OpenAction API, which is cross-compatible with the Stream Deck SDK, allowing a wide range of pre-existing plugins to be used.
